Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: After dipyridamole , ischemic ST - segment depression ( 0 . 05 mV or more ) was observed in 84 % of the non - MI group , 29 % of the ANT - MI group , 63 % of the INF - MI group and 61 % of the total population .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| ischemic ST-segment depression (0.05 mV or more) |
| MI (Myocardial Infarction) |
| ANT-MI (ANT-Myocardial Infarction) |
| INF-MI (INF-Myocardial Infarction) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| ischemic ST-segment depression (0.05 mV or more) |
| MI (Myocardial Infarction) |
| ANT-MI (Antiplatelet therapy-related Myocardial Infarction) |
| INF-MI (Infarction-Myocardial Infarction) |

Note: I assumed that "ANT" refers to antiplatelet therapy, and "INF" is short for infarction.
